position: Senior Consultant at Michael Page - Consulting, Private Equity and Venture Capital

positions.subtitle: Michael Page
positions.description: Michael Page is one of the world's leading professional recruitment consultancies. We deliver tailored recruitment solutions to job seekers and a broad range of blue chip employers across 36 countries worldwide.In my role I utilise industry expertise to effectively understand the needs of my clients in the Private Equity, Investment Banking, Consulting, Venture Capital, Public Markets and Corporate Strategy space and successfully match those to the needs of individuals seeking their next career move.If you're looking for a mid-senior level role in any of these sectors, feel free to reach out on sagarbaver@michaelpage.co.in
positions.title: Senior Consultant - Consulting, Private Equity and Venture Capital
positions.description_html:
Michael Page is one of the world's leading professional recruitment consultancies. We deliver tailored recruitment solutions to job seekers and a broad range of blue chip employers across 36 countries worldwide.

In my role I utilise industry expertise to effectively understand the needs of my clients in the Private Equity, Investment Banking, Consulting, Venture Capital, Public Markets and Corporate Strategy space and successfully match those to the needs of individuals seeking their next career move.

If you're looking for a mid-senior level role in any of these sectors, feel free to reach out on sagarbaver@michaelpage.co.in
